headline: Why Wall Street Is Closely Watching Zebra Technologies Corporation (ZBRA)
summary: Zebra Technologies Corporation (NASDAQ:ZBRA) is among the best hardware stocks to buy according to analysts. As of December 8, Zebra Technologies Corporation (NASDAQ:ZBRA) has a rating of ‘Buy’ or equivalent from 70% of the analysts covering the stock. With a median price target of $355, the stock has about 35% upside from the current price. […]
